text: Manú Airport is an airstrip serving the village of Boca Manú and the Manú National Park in the Madre de Dios Region of Peru. The grass runway is on the opposite side of the Madre de Dios River, southwest of the village, which is near the confluence of the Madre de Dios and Manú Rivers. ==See also== * * *Transport in Peru *List of airports in Peru ==References== ==External links== *Google Maps - Manú *OpenStreetMap - Manú *OurAirports - Manú *SkyVector - Manú * Category:Airports in Peru Category:Buildings and structures in Madre de Dios Region
title: Manú Airport
